text: @NYGovCuomo #45, #GOP & #FoxNews have blood and pain on their collective hands. https://t.co/vzFyZpPa5f They enabled & perpetuated lies & people are dying because they believed in you. https://t.co/74xK5tXI9t They have betrayed God & humankind. #25thAmendmentNow https://t.co/McA5StIFPo
